summary: A new female body replacer in UNP family.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=#cc6699][size=5][b]About[/b][/size][/color][/heading]
This is a new female body replacer in UNP family.
It is a high quality new body mesh (not a high poly), what contains a best things from all known by me bodies for Skyrim. Of course, at my tastes.

Maybe this body is not same as in real life, but it's the game! And the game is a fairy tale! And i like it! It is very beautiful!

And it’s a new alternative to CBBE bodyslide for skinny bodies!

This mod is NOT a bodyslide preset, and not compatible with bodyslide.

[color=#cc6699][size=3][b]The shapes[/b][/size][/color]
The body shape based on UNP Skinny (at 0%) and UNP Main bodies (at 0%).
And the breast shape based on UNP Main (at 0%) and SevenBase (at 100%).

[color=#cc6699][size=3][b]Weight slider[/b][/size][/color]
Weight slider is amazing! Just try it!
Now you can select a breast size exactly what you want and body will be always slim (between UNP Skinny and Main).
To change player's weight just type "showracemenu" in console or "player.setnpcweight X", where X is a number from 0 to 100.

[color=#cc6699][size=3][b]Textures[/b][/size][/color]
You can use any UNP compatible textures. And texture options including pubic hairs. This is a mesh only. This mod is fully compatible with all UNP textures.

[color=#cc6699][size=3][b]Unique system[/b][/size][/color]
This mod uses an unique system of two _0 meshes.
So, boots, gloves and neck will never affects by weight slider. It made to goal always slim body.
To fix any boots and gloves you need only copy _0 mesh to _1.
But fix neck it’s not so easy. This is why this contains the femalehead.tri and femaleheadraces.tri files.
I can patch this files from any mod, what contains it too and conflicts.
Later i plan to make a tutorial for other moders, how to do it by yourself.


[heading][color=#cc6699][size=5][b]Required files[/b][/size][/color][/heading]
Any custom skeleton replacer. Use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800]XPMS[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16712]Skulltyrant[/url]
And any UNP textures. For example [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425]Real Girls[/url].



[heading][color=#cc6699][size=5][b]Changelog[/b][/size][/color][/heading]
v3.1
* Added some breast gravity to _1 mesh. So, now they are more UNPB like. But not the same.
* The maximum size of body returned to 100%
* Perfected symmetry on _1 mesh.

v2.0
* Perfected seams on neck, hands and foots at _1 mesh.
* More symmetry on _0 mesh.
* A new symmetrical bone weights. It's still not perfect but much better than original UNP.
* Maximum size of body was reduced to 80% old size. Now it is more realistic at 100%, and easily to convert a new armors to the body.

v1.0
* Initial release



[heading][color=#cc6699][size=5][b]Recommended mods[/b][/size][/color][/heading]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213]HDT HighHeels System[/url] by hydrogensayshdt
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30642]Elewin Pumps 2[/url] by Elewin
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13272]Victorias High Heel walk Animation plus BBP[/url] by xp32



[heading][color=#cc6699][size=5][b]Armors and clothes conversions[/b][/size][/color][/heading]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44064]Osare Underwear - UNP Topmodel[/url] by es2
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52015]Brokefoots UNP Mashup for UNP Top Model body with TBBP[/url] by Chitlin
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51607]Prisoner Clothes for UNP Top Model with TBBP[/url] by Chitlin
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52221]UNP Top Model Ancient Nord - Draugr Armor[/url] by Chitlin
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52395]Theminblacks Barbarian armor for UNP Top Model with TBBP[/url] by Chitlin
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54423]Ancient Draugr Armor - UNP Top Model TBBP[/url] by Deserter X
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53494]Wild Huntress UNP Top Model with TBBP - UNP[/url] by Deserter X
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56984]Top Model Vanilla Armors Conversion Project[/url] by Quadrefoil


[color=#cc6699][size=3][b]The plans[/b][/size][/color]
I plan to make some conversions. But i also rely on the help of other modelers.

[color=#cc6699][size=3][b]How to easy convert any UNP boots and gloves[/b][/size][/color]
Just copy all necessary _0.nif files to _1.nif.



[line]
[color=#cc6699][size=3][b]Tools used[/b][/size][/color]
Blender 2.68
Blender 2.49 + NIF Tools
NifScope 1.1.3
Python 3

[color=#cc6699][size=3][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]
Dimon99 for the amazing UNP body
Sevennity for Bombshell body
DeMoNhUnTeR1986 for SeveNBase TBBP body
Phygit for the FemFeet
